actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to permit the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to change a State's priority list of wastewater construction projects if the Administrator determines that Federal funds for such projects have not been equitably distributed within such State.
subjects: Federal aid to water pollution control

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act (the Clean Water Act) to authorize the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to modify a State's priority list for the allotment of Federal funds for the construction of publicly-owned treatment works if the Administrator determines that over a period of ten years such funds have not been equitably distributed. Requires public hearings and notice to the State's Governor before any such modification is made.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to permit the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to change a State's priority list of wastewater construction projects if the Administrator determines that Federal funds for such projects have not been equitably distributed within such State.
